insert: INSERT INTO test (name, status_id, method_name, project_id, session_id, start_time, end_time, env, browser, author_id) VALUES
check_for_presence: SELECT * FROM test WHERE name = '%s' AND status_id = %d AND method_name = '%s' AND project_id = %d AND session_id = %d AND start_time = '%s' AND end_time = '%s' AND env = '%s' AND browser = '%s'
select_condition: SELECT * from test WHERE id LIKE '%%%d%d%%' LIMIT 10
insert_author_id: INSERT INTO author (name, login, email) VALUES ('Maksim', 'lorem', 'ipsum')
update_test_entry: UPDATE test SET status_id = %d, start_time = '%s', end_time = '%s' WHERE id = %d
